scripts.serve: concurrently --kill-others "npx ecstatic public" "npm run watch-sass" "watchify src/chat.js -p esmify -dv -o public/chat.js"
scripts.start: npm run chat && npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.chat: mkdir -p public/chat && cp src/_chat.html public/chat/index.html && browserify src/chat.js -p esmify -dv > public/chat.js
scripts.build: mkdir -p public && npm run copy && node ./build.js && npm run sass && npm run build-animation && npm run chat && npm run build-ntl-button
scripts.build-ntl-button: mkdir -p public/ssc && cp src/ssc/* public/ssc && browserify src/ssc/index.js -p esmify -dv > public/ssc/bundle.js
scripts.copy: cp src/_static/* public && cp src/animate.js public && cp src/favicon.ico public && mkdir -p public/font && cp src/font/* public/font && cp src/index.html public && mkdir -p public/img && cp src/img/*.* public/img/ && mkdir -p public/drafts && cp src/drafts/* public/drafts
